blog_site_key1: name: Making Blog website like Medium
blog_site_key3: Iss project mei hum `Medium` jaisi ek blog website ka basic version banana sikhenge.
blog_site_key5:
Iss project ki suruvat karne se pehele aap ko blog website ko visit karke samjho ki vo kaise kaam karti hain.

blog_site_key8: ### Iss project ko shuru karne se phele ye cheeze dhyan deni jaruri hain.
blog_site_key9: Ye project hum JavaScript ka use karke banayenge issleye humne enough JavaScript aani jaruri hain.
blog_site_key10: Iss project main hum da`tab`ase ka aache tarike se use karna bhi sikhenge.
blog_site_key11: Aur front-end ke leye Html, Css, Bootstrap jaisi languages ka isstemal karnge.
blog_site_key12: Aur Da`tab`ase ke leye hum MySql use karnege.

aur apne da`tab`ase ko banane ke leye ek script lekhe.
Iss da`tab`ase ka hum apne projet main use karnge.
